item.title: What to buy for a trade after light CPI: Small caps and low quality
item.description: The cooler inflation reading could be a major boon for small caps and lower quality stocks, which could rip higher after skipping out on this year's g...

item.title: Buying the dip on this footwear stock using options after 'overdone' sell-off
item.description: Options trader Nishant Pant breaks down this "bull call spread."

item.title: Musk's legal threats are 'massive headache and headwind for Apple,' Dan Ives says
item.description: The battle between the Tesla CEO and Apple could "really sort of spiral and take on a life of its own," Ives told CNBC.

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades this software provider ahead of September investor day
item.description: Clearwater Analytics' core business is "consistently growing" free cash flow at more than 20% annually, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says buy the dip on this software stock, calls for 50% surge
item.description: The firm upgraded the stock to overweight from equal weight.
